entry.id: http://lanzry.github.io/2017/04/02/undefined/undefined/使用github pages + hexo建立你的个人博客/
entry.content:
title:使用github pages + hexo建立你的个人博客

学习吴小龙的文章手把手教你建github技术博客by hexo而建立的博客，大家可以查看原文即可做出和我一样的博客。

hexo: Hello World

Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

<span class="xml">$ hexo <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"xml"</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-tag"</span>></span><span class="hljs-tag"><<<span class="hljs-attribute">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-title"</span>></span>span<span class="hljs-tag"></<span entry.summary:
title: 使用github pages + hexo建立你的个人博客
date: 2017-04-02 15:25:52

entry.content:
title:使用github pages + hexo建立你的个人博客

学习吴小龙的文章手把手教你建github技术博客by hexo而建立的博客，大家可以查看原文即可做出和我一样的博客。

hexo: Hello World

Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-string">"My New Post"</span>
`</pre>

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

<pre>`$ hexo <span class="hljs-keyword">server</span>
`</pre>

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

<pre>`<span class="hljs-variable">$ </span>hexo generate
`</pre>

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

<pre>`<span class="hljs-variable">$ </span>hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
